Question
========

The UvA employed 272 professors in 2007. Of these, 16% were women. How is the probability of finding at least 30% women?

Answerlist
----------

* 0.11
* 0.15
* 0.45

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.11: Correct
* 0.15: Incorrect
* 0.45: Incorrect
